comments:
Build: I20050315

I found the following NPE in my log file.  I didn't notice any other
side-effects.  I'm not sure if this is a case of a client incorrectly using an
extension tracker after it has been closed - if so, perhaps ExtensionTracker
should throw a more descriptive exception (perhaps IllegalStateException) to
indicate this more clearly to the caller.

John suggested that I use one lock object instead of locking on the fields
themselves, this way I can clean-up the structure and avoid the NPE.
This has been fixed in HEAD.
